{"id":829753234,"question_id":43,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1666678853,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/829753234/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Multiply Strings","memory":"43.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String multiply(String num1, String num2) {\n     \n        if(num1.equals(\"0\"))\n            return \"0\";\n        \n        if(num2.equals(\"0\"))\n            return \"0\";\n        \n        int[] arr = new int[num1.length() + num2.length()-1];\n        \n        \n        for(int i=num1.length()-1; i>=0; i--){\n            for(int j=num2.length()-1; j>=0; j--){\n                \n                arr[i+j] += (num1.charAt(i)-'0') * (num2.charAt(j)-'0');\n            }\n        }\n        \n        for(int i=arr.length-1; i>0; i--){\n            arr[i-1] += arr[i]/10;\n            arr[i] =  arr[i]%10;\n        }\n        \n        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();\n        for(int a: arr)\n            sb.append(String.valueOf(a));\n        \n        return sb.toString();\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"multiply-strings","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
